flawed_nl_solution:
James is now 27+3=<<27+3=30>>30 years old
In 5 years James will be 30+5=<<30+5=53>>53 years old
So in 5 years Matt will be 53*2=<<53*2=106>>106 years old
That means Matt is now 106-5=<<106-5=101>>101 years old
#### 101

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
